https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xKVODmmc7Ydm59YPxxjcLSNrmgg.jpg A writer (Hidetoshi Nishijima) who has an artistic crisis purchases a stack of diaries written by a teenage girl (Yû Aoi) who is fatally ill. Living in different time lines both are able to communicate via writing diaries… Diary from the past
